lead_paragraph: Jeremy Roenick, a nine-time All-Star, signed a one-year, $500,000 contract with the San Jose Sharks as he postponed retirement for the chance to get his 500th goal while chasing his first championship. Roenick, an outspoken 37-year-old center and a two-time Olympian, has 495 goals in an 18-year career.
